statements: DELETE FROM student_data WHERE course_id = 200 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM student_data WHERE name = 'John' AND age > 20;
DELETE FROM student_data WHERE course_id IN (SELECT id FROM courses WHERE name = 'Mathematics');
DELETE FROM student_scores WHERE student_id = '789e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND subject = 'Math';
DELETE FROM student_scores WHERE subject = 'Math' AND semester = 1;
DELETE FROM student_logs WHERE log_type = 'absent' AND log_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_id IN (SELECT enrollment_id FROM grades WHERE exam_score < 60);
DELETE FROM courses WHERE department = 'Science' AND lecturer = 'Dr. Smith'
